availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: William Kreppe (Nashville, TN, carpenter and soldier)

body.p: Nashville, Tennessee, carpenter and soldier. Native of WÃ¼rttemberg, Germany. Immigrated to the United States in c1859. Carpenter in Nashville in 1861. Served in the 1st Tennessee Infantry Regiment (C.S.A.) as a private from May 8, 1861 to February 13, 1862. Imprisoned at the Kentucky State Penitentiary in 1865.

ab.bibl:
Compiled Service Records of Confederate Soldiers who Served in Organizations from the State of Tennessee, NARA RG 109, Microfilm Series M268, Roll 0103.
KYR-0001-004-1459.
